danfulea.misc.graphics3d

Class SimpleLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.media.j3d.SceneGraphObject
      • javax.media.j3d.Node
        • javax.media.j3d.Leaf
          • javax.media.j3d.Shape3D
            • danfulea.misc.graphics3d.SimpleLine

  • public class SimpleLine
extends javax.media.j3d.Shape3D
    Class for visualize a 3D SimpleLine. It is based on old java3D tutorials freely available on the web (at that time).
    Author:
    Dan Fulea, 12 MAY. 2005
